infoDescription.message: Protects you from tracing and malicious domain names, filters banner ads, pop-up ads and video ads, all in real-time.

bankSafeTips.message: You are visiting a bank website, Cloudopt is guarding you!

gameSafeTips.message: You are visiting a game website, Cloudopt is guarding you!

shopSafeTips.message: You are visiting a shopping website, Cloudopt is guarding you!

hospitalSafeTips.message: You are visiting a hospital website, Cloudopt is guarding you!

ominiboxTips.message: Enter a phone number or a URL to Check security

dangDownTips.message: Detecting that you are downloading files from a dangerous website, Cloudopt has blocked that for you.

popupEvaluateTipsSubtitle.message: Your comments will help defend more people against dangerous, phishing sites.

optionTipsInputUrlisNull.message: Empty domain name, please check and enter

optionTipsInputUrlisError.message: Invalid domain name, please check and enter

optionCloudReputationDetails.message: Blocks dangerous sites, protect you from threats from phishing, malicious websites

optionFileDownloadDetails.message: Automatically blocks downloads from dangerous websites

optionSafeCoinDetails.message: Helps to avoid your computers to be used by malicious websites for (bitcoins) mining

optionSafePrivacyDetails.message: Prevents the analysis sites to track or to record you browsing activity

optionAdblockActivatingDetails.message: Automatically prevents displaying of ads on the page

optionAdblockDisplayDetails.message: Shows the number of blocked ads on the extension icon

optionAdblockHeuristicDetails.message: Heuristic detection can effectively intercept some of the potential advertisement, ordinary users are not recommanded to open

optionAdblockLightDetails.message: Helps adblocking even when in bad networking

optionTotalAdBlockCount.message: Malicious ads and mining script intercepts

optionTodayAdBlockCount.message: Malicious ads and mining script intercepts today

optionSyncBookmarkDetails.message: Sync browser bookmarks to the cloud

optionSyncHistoryDetails.message: Sync browser history to the cloud

optionSyncPriorityDetails.message: Choose local or cloud data to have precedence when syncing

optionSyncSavedContentDetails.message: Click the button to see what you have synced to the cloud

optionBookmarkSerchDetails.message: Will also search you bookmarks when you are using the search engine

optionSafeTipsDetails.message: Security tips pop up when you are browsing sites that would be imitated sites like bank sites and e-commerce sites

optionKeyboardDetails.message: Automatically pops up a virtual keyboard when you enter a password to protect your input from being monitored

optionMemoryOptimizationDetails.message: Automatically optimizes memory of tabs when system memory usage is higher than 80%

optionClassifyHelpText.message: When you submit a cloud reputation assessment, your anonymous security-related information will also be submitted to help protecting people. This also helps to improve our cloud. You certainly need not to worry about privacy. More informations in our Privacy Protection Agreement.

optionDataCollectionDetails.message: In order to provide you with better services, Cloudopt will be allowed to submit some technical information and interactive data. Privacy Policy

optionManualTips.message: Submit samples to Cloudopt Cloud Security Center

updateTips2.message: , update history is accessible on the official blog.

contextMenus1.message: Add to the cloud security allowlist

contextMenus4.message: Add to the cloud security blocklist

manualTips.message: Left click to select elements to be blocked, right click to exit selection mode

manualSaveTips1.message: Save failed. Please make sure the format is correct

adblockInitTips.message: Ad blocking engine is initializing, takes a few minutes, please do not close the browser during initialization.

optionFollowUsText.message: Follow our Twitter or WeChat account to get updates on Cloudopt products and see the latest security news in the industry.

weixinDialogText.message: Please use Wechat to scan the QR code.

optionDnsSpeedDetails.message: Parses DNS for potential sites in advance to speed up the connection to the site.

optionWebPrereadingDetails.message: Reads pages that may be accessed in advance to speed up page loading.

filterNotUpdated.message: Filter rules has not been updated

optionLoginTips.message: Sign in to stay in sync

optionLoginRefreshTips.message: Refresh this page after successful login
